transcript: so here are three laws of advertising that will always be true anything is better than nothing some things are better than others and nothing works forever and as long as you keep those three in mind then you can pretty much know what you have to do so if you're advertising well if you're doing nothing you need to do something if you are doing stuff you can do things better than you currently are and once you do start getting things that are working really really well you have to keep an eye on the future because they're not going to work forever and you always want to take a certain percentage to invest in the future of trying new things out so you can start another stream and then repeat the cycle
